title: mamerico
lyrics: kurete yuku kiset su wo oika kete ta nugekake no sanda ru kira ri namimite ru nanige nai koto ba ni mimi wo suma shi awai sora miage te fu reru to gi te to te sugite yuku omoi de wa ira na i ke do toki no oto kienu you ko e wo kikase te hoshi no suna mata taku umi ni yure te shiroid zuki tokete yuku chi heisen futa ri sugite yuku omoi de wa irana i ke do toki no oto kienu you koe wo ki kasete
